title: Reduced importance of affixes across the board and minor corrections/bugfixes

changes.change: Route cards (when viewing them from an overview page) have received some minor polish, rounded user icons etc.
Pull and route descriptions now support the a tag - with only a select list of WoW-related domains being allowed to link to.

Route overview pages now calculate popularity a bit differently - the amount of affixes assigned to a route is no longer penalized. Affixes affect the routes much less than ever before - so this penalty is no longer really relevant.

Reduced the amount of background caching going on wrt affixes. Same as above - affixes don't matter as much as they used to, so having a pre-built cache for routes on specific affixes is no longer necessary. This will greatly reduce the time required to rebuild the cache in the background and increase performance as a result.
Affixes for the coming weeks added (with the assumption the rotation is the same as S1 going forward).
Selecting a composition for your route now lists class first, then specialization and finally race.
Changing a key level in one route will no longer "adjust them" in another route. This was a visual bug and the key level wasn't actually changed - but this is resolved now.
